name: Carbon Capture
description:
PROOF OF CONCEPT

"Carbon Capture" A Proof of Concept Submission for the Carbon Capture 2021 Game Jam by Gopher Games.

Gopher Games are the following:

  • Emily Blane
  • Tomas Hudak
  • Daniel Paul

Made in the Unity engine, this game was envisioned to create an educational and intuitive puzzle game that can be played by all ages. Our goal is to create a game which showcases the process of Carbon Capture in a way that is both fun and engaging.

Controls:

Mouse Movement - move cursor

Left Mouse Click - pick up pipe and release on another to swap them

Currently the win condition doesn't work however the mechanics are there at present.

The idea is to create a path from the factory to the solvent building as fast as you can!
